title: MD
biography: Raed Arafat is a Syrian-born Romanian intensive care physician of Palestinian origin, specialised in anesthesiology.
aiSummary: Raed Arafat is a emergency medicine specialist with an H-index of 15 at Romanian Emergency Services (Member). Has been published in BMJ supportive & palliative care, Japan journal of nursing science : JJNS, European review for medical and pharmacological sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
